conversations.content: Read the security policy document
Create a notes file in the project root

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732118600000_e7f8g9h0i", "workspaceId": "ws_1732118600000_h9i0j1k2l", "sessionDescription": "Creating notes", "sessionMemory": "Adding project notes", "toolContext": "Creating notes file", "primaryGoal": "Documentation", "subgoal": "Create NOTES.md"}, "filePath": "/NOTES.md", "content": "# Project Notes

- Remember to update tests
- Check dependencies monthly

## Architecture Decisions
TBD"}
